oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Benefits of the management of agricultural landscape: an application of the landscape value trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pouta, Eija
Salmiovirta, Maija
Soini, Katriina
Kivinen, Tapani
Uusitalo, Marja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Landscape and recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study we are interested of the benefits of a landscape management on a very local scale. The study area comprises of the agricultural land and its surroundings around three villages in Nurmij√§rvi in Southern Finland. The survey data were collected with a mail survey addressed to all households on the area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pouta, Eija; Salmiovirta, Maija; Soini, Katriina; Kivinen, Tapani and Uusitalo, Marja (2009) Benefits of the management of agricultural landscape: an application of the landscape value trade. Paper at: ISSRM 2009 15th International symposium on society and resource management, Vienna, 6.7.-8.7.2009.
